attributes.action: Make our votes count. 1 person = 1 vote.
attributes.additional_details:
See link below to check how much your vote currently matters in your constituency.

http://m.voterpower.org.uk/about-voter-power-index
attributes.background:
The average UK vote only counts for 0.305 of a vote.
At a time where our politicians are determined to deliver on democracy, we really need to all recognise the very undemocratic way our votes are counted.
One person should be one vote. Nothing more, nothing less.
